>

</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 294 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Price** 75 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Concentrated sap of stinging weeds makes an effective toxin. 

**Saving Throw** DC 27 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 minute; **Maximum Duration** 6 minutes; **Stage 1** 3d6 poison damage (1 minute); **Stage 2** 4d6 poison damage (1 minute); **Stage 3** 6d6 poison damage (1 minute)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
